text: Sore de kare-ra ga moshi anata gata ni kotaerarenainara, kare-ra wa tada, jibun no (hikui) yokubō ni shitagatte iru ni suginai koto o shire. Arrā kara no michibiki ga naku, jibun no yokubō ni shitagau mono ijō ni michi ni 迷 U-sha ga arou ka. Hontōni arrā wa aku o okonau min o onmichibiki ni nara renai
